statements: UPDATE passengers SET first_name = 'Alice', last_name = 'Smith' WHERE passenger_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE flights SET available_seats = 150, departure_time = '2022-12-31 08:00:00' WHERE flight_number = 'ABC123';
UPDATE passengers SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', gender = 'Male' WHERE passenger_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE flights SET departure_time = '2022-08-15 10:00:00', arrival_time = '2022-08-15 15:00:00', available_seats = 150 WHERE flight_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE passengers SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE passenger_id=12345;
UPDATE flights SET departure_date='2023-01-15', departure_time='08:00:00', arrival_date='2023-01-15', arrival_time='10:30:00' WHERE flight_number='ABC123';
UPDATE passengers SET first_name='Alice', last_name='Smith' WHERE passenger_id=1;
UPDATE flights SET departure_date='2022-06-30', arrival_time='10:00:00' WHERE flight_id=3;
UPDATE passengers SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE passenger_id='a1234567-89bc-4def-1234-56789abcdef12';

UPDATE flights SET arrival_time='2023-12-31 23:59:59', departure_time='2023-12-31 12:00:00', flight_number='F1234' WHERE flight_id='223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE passengers SET age = 35, email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE flights SET departure_airport = 'JFK', airplane_model = 'Boeing 737' WHERE flight_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE passengers SET age = 35, email = 'updated_email@example.com' WHERE passenger_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE reservations SET booking_status = 'CONFIRMED', reservation_date = '2023-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE reservation_id = '987e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE flights SET departure_city = 'Tokyo', destination_city = 'London' WHERE flight_id = 456;
UPDATE passengers SET nationality='Italian' WHERE passenger_id=101;
UPDATE flights SET arrival_time='2022-12-31 23:59:59' WHERE departure_time<'2022-12-31 12:00:00';
